RuuviR 0.0.0.0001
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Basic Ruuvitag visualizations

read ruuvi data from local machine

LoadRuuviExports.Rd

csv data to R

LoadRuuviExports(path)

Arguments

path

local path to csv files

Examples

 LoadRuuviExports(path = 'C:\\Users\\talon_000\\Dropbox\\2021\\ruuvi\\m210801saunakahala')
